Module com.javarepowizards.portfoliomanager
Package com.javarepowizards.portfoliomanager.dao.user

Interface IUserDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserDAO
public interface IUserDAO
Interface defining data access operations for User entities.

  • Method Details

    • createUser

      boolean createUser(User user, double startingBalance) throws SQLException
      Creates a new user in the database.
      Parameters:
      user - the User to create
      Returns:
      true if the user was successfully created
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getBalance

      double getBalance(int userId) throws SQLException
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getUserByEmail

      Optional<User> getUserByEmail(String email) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a user by their email address.
      Parameters:
      email - the email address to search for
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the matching User, or empty if none found
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getUserByUsername

      Optional<User> getUserByUsername(String username) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a user by their username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username to search for
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the matching User, or empty if none found
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getUserById

      Optional<User> getUserById(int userId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a user by their unique ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID to search for
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the matching User, or empty if none found
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getCurrentUser

      Optional<User> getCurrentUser()
      Retrieves the currently authenticated user.
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the current User, or empty if no user is authenticated

    • updateSimulationDifficulty

      void updateSimulationDifficulty(int userId, String difficulty) throws SQLException
      Updates the simulation difficulty preference for a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to update
      difficulty - the new simulation difficulty level
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • updateEmail

      void updateEmail(int userId, String email)
      Updates the email address of a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to update
      email - the new email address

    • updateUsername

      void updateUsername(int userId, String username)
      Updates the username of a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to update
      username - the new username

    • updatePassword

      void updatePassword(int userId, String newPassword)
      Updates the password hash of a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to update
      newPassword - the new password hash

    • updateFullName

      void updateFullName(int userId, String fName, String lName) throws SQLException
      Updates the first and/or last name of a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to update
      fName - the new first name, or null to leave unchanged
      lName - the new last name, or null to leave unchanged
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs
